name: B.I.G
description:
B.I.G is a puzzle game where you play characters depending on the colors to solve each puzzle to advance to the next level. There are four colors of red, green, purple and blue. Every color has its own special power red can destroy walls, blue can make you float in wind area's, green can spawn invisible floors and purple can move floors from one position to another position.

Its up to you to solve the puzzles and finish the game in the least amount of time. Do you have what it takes to Finish the game?

These game contains
Levels - B.I.G contains 20 levels in the game. After every level the game difficulty increases and every level contains 3 health points if you die you will lose a health point and if you loose all the health points you will be respawned in the last checkpoint.

Skins - In this game you can change the skin of the floor and B.I.G contains 5 types of skins which can be changed at any point of the game.

Background - When we play games we sometimes wish we can change the background but you don't worry we can in B.I.G . The game contains 5 different types of background which you change whenever you need.



This game may be updated and also we may increase the levels of the game for a better experience.
